extendedInfo.description: Sudoku Challenge is the best Sudoku Game you can find on mobile platform. With its elegant interface and intuitive gameplay you will be addicted and can't stop playing anymore !Resolve hundreds of Sudoku challenges in 5 different difficulties. Many features are there to help you figure out the solution faster and all these options can be disabled for the veteran players !Keep your best scores and compare with friends to prove who's better in solving Sudokus.If you encounter any issue or problem, please take a moment and let us know so we can fix it as soon as possible and keep bringing you new features.You can follow us on our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Diginium-Graphics/387916321231070Or our Google+ page: https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/109912751618747796461/109912751618747796461/postsYou can also send us an e-mail: diginium.graphics@gmail.comWe still working on bringing new features to this app such as:- Worldwide leaderboard- More levels- A new difficulty level (Extreme)Tags: Sudoku, Free, Challenge, Game, PuzzleThanks,
